text: Eaba Moporofeta o re: “Allah U khethile saule hoba morena oa lona.” Eaba ba re : “Saule a ka bale matla a puso joang holim’a rona, empa rona re na le bokhoni bapuso ho mo feta, a sa leruo le lekaneng?” Moporofeta a re: “Ruri Allah U mo khethile holim’a lona, o mo ekelelitse matlotlo a bohlale le matla a le. Allah U sitsa eo a ikhethetseng eena ka puso ea hae. Etsoe Allah U hlokomela bohle, U tseba lintho tsohle
